---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r, setup}
library(tidyverse)
load("datos/millas.rda")
```


```{r}
glimpse(millas)
```

```{r}
library(skimr)
skim(millas)
```

```{r}
muestra <- millas %>%
  sample_frac(0.5)
```

```{r}
ggplot(millas) +
  geom_histogram(aes(autopista), binwidth = 5)
```

```{r}
ggplot(muestra) +
  geom_histogram(aes(autopista), binwidth = 5)
```

```{r}
muestra %>%
  select(autopista, clase, cilindros) %>%
  lm(autopista ~., data = .) %>%
  summary()
```

```{r}
modelo <- muestra %>%
  select(autopista, clase, cilindros) %>%
  lm(autopista ~., data = .)

save(modelo, file = "modelo.rds")
```
